item.title: GOG Has Had To Hire Private Investigators To Track Down IP Rights Holders
item.author: (Jack Coleman)

item.title: Windows "SUCKS": How I'd Fix it by a retired Microsoft Windows engineer
item.description:
"Windows Sucks" is the most frequent comment I get - here's what I really think and how I would address the most common Windows annoyances: a love letter to Windows wrapped in a rant.
Free Sample of my Book on the Spectrum: https://amzn.to/3zBinWM
Check out my new merch store at: http://davesgaragemerch.com/
Check out ShopTalk, our weekly podcast, every Friday! https://www.youtube.com/@davepl
item.author: (Dave's Garage)

item.title: Deep Space Exploitation is OUT NOW! - Deep Space Exploitation by JuhrJuhr
item.description: Hello! Deep Space Exploitation is now fully released and playable here on Itch and over on Steam! For the first 2 WEEKS the game will be 20% OFF, and 100% of the earnings from Itch sales will GO TO IT...

item.title: Please Implement This Simple SLO
item.description: Hello Newguy! I'm glad to see that you've completed your on-boarding here at Corp. Générique. I have your first ticket ready. It's a simple task. Just 2 story points. But it should give you the opportunity to learn a little about how our services work together. Simply implement an availability SLO for our cherished Foo service. You know how to implement an SLO, right?

item.title: Internationaal Strafhof neemt afscheid van Microsoft 365
item.description: Het Internationaal Strafhof (International Criminal Court, ICC) ruilt Microsoft 365 in voor Open Desk, een Europees open source alternatief. Dat schrijft de Duitse krant Handelsblatt. De krant verwacht dat het ICC met de overstap mogelijk een trend start binnen de Europese publieke sector.
item.author: (Marjolein van Trigt)

item.title: Kimi K2 Thinking
item.description: Kimi K2 Thinking, Moonshot's best open-source thinking model.

item.title: Archive.today: FBI Demands Data from Provider Tucows
item.description: The mysterious website Archive.today is coming under the FBI's crosshairs. A court order is forcing the provider Tucows to hand over user data.

item.title: What the hell have you built.
Big Breaking Changes in .NET 10
item.description:
Get 40% off Dometrain with code UNLOCK40: https://dometrain.com/?ref=nick-chapsas&promo=youtube&coupon_code=UNLOCK40
Hello, everybody. I'm Nick, and in this video, I want to talk about the .NET 10 breaking changes that are coming up later this month. This year we have a few big ones and you need to prepare your codebases.
Check out my workshops: https://dometrain.com/workshops/
Don't forget to comment, like and subscribe :)

item.title: App Showcase
item.description: Atuin replaces your existing shell history with a SQLite database, and records additional context for your commands.
